author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Remove some more redundancy in the C++ side of the bindings.  This

(BlameReceiver): New.  Class which is used to gather the callback-based

author: kfogel
msg: Update for r23912, which changed the help output slightly.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Add a new test for blame, both the callback-, and byte array-based APIs.
(BlameReceiver): New.  Private callback class to collect the blame data.
(testBasicBlame): New test for basic blame functionality.
